Launchers Module Documentation¶

Visual¶

visual.run(model, visualJS=[], *params)¶
Execute the simulation with visual representation.
Args:
model: Model that is simulated. visualJS: JS files with the visualization elements that are included in the JavaScript browser visualization template. params: Parameters loaded in the models about the agents and anything else.

Batch¶

batch.run(model, paramsFixed, paramsVariable, iterations, ramen=False)¶
Execute the simulation as batch way.
Args:
model: Model that is simulated. paramsFixed: Fixed parameters, invariable in different simulations. paramsVariable: Parameters that change between different simulations. iterations: Number of simulations that will be executed.
